job.title: Software Engineer

usersltligtltligtexperience with fullstack developmentltligtltulgtltligtjavascripttypescript frontend frameworks preferably react open to other technologies such as angular vue redux ltligtltligtapi development on the backend preferably python open to other technologies such as ruby go php javaltligtltulgtltligtjudgement around when to do something quickly and when to build for the long termltligtltligtproduct instincts and a keen eye for why users want what they wantltligtltligta desire to strengthen those around youltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtif you dont meet these criteria but are still excited about maven reach out anyway wed love to hear from youltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtour cultureltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwere growing quickly but were still a startup and youll have the opportunity to shape how we work so far weve looked for teammates wholtbrgtltulgtltligtare hungry to learn and can give and receive egofree feedbackltligtltligttake pride in doing great work and in helping others do the sameltligtltligtvalue clear thinking and open communicationltligtltligtdont just solve problems they seek them out take ownership of the solution and see it through from idea to executionltligtltligtare willing to throw away ideas and are optimistic enough to keep hunting for new onesltligtltligtthink and focus on getting the right stuff done not the most stuff possibleltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtcome build with usltbrgtltbrgtwere a fully remote company with employees in new york toronto austin the bay area and beyond anyone within hour of us time zones is
